description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' that implements the interface 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' for testing purposes. It uses Google's Mock framework to mock various methods related to service introspection and control.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for unit testing.

methods.name: ~ServiceMock
methods.description: Default destructor for ServiceMock.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name string of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign of the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix associated with the service.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has been resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a certain feature is supported given a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns the subsystems of the plugin host.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a JSON element with a uint32_t identifier.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with specified strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a plugin notification.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a plugin notification.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model identifier.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is running in background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns an accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the proxy stub path.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns a hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution on the input string.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the last state change.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Sets or gets configuration line with a string.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns the system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns the system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns the plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Gets the start mode.

methods.name: StartMode (overload)
methods.description: Sets the start mode with a specific mode.

methods.name: Resumed (overload)
methods.description: Sets the resumed state.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate with a specified value.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Returns library search paths for a given string.
